instruction: Come up with ideas for a new business that takes advantage of artificial intelligence.
output: One idea for a new business taking advantage of artificial intelligence is an automated document creation and review service. This business would use AI to generate legal documents according to user input, such as contracts and statements of work. It would also use AI to review and analyze existing documents for potential issues, ensuring accuracy and eliminating the need for manual review. This business would provide customers with an efficient and accurate method of generating and reviewing legal documents.
